Hero.title: Discover Excellence
Hero.subtitle: A premium selection of motorcycles for all enthusiasts

Products.contactForQuote: Contact us for a personalized quote

About.title: About KARTA COMMERCE GENERAL
About.description: KARTA COMMERCE GENERAL has established itself as the reference for quality commerce in C么te d'Ivoire. Our QASKI range represents our excellence in premium motorcycles. Our passion for excellence and commitment to our customers set us apart.

quality.title: Excellence & Quality
quality.description: We rigorously select our models to offer you only high-quality, reliable and efficient motorcycles. Every vehicle undergoes strict quality control before delivery.

service.title: After-Sales Service
service.description: Our experienced technical team supports you well beyond the purchase. Maintenance, repairs, spare parts - we ensure the longevity of your investment.

pricing.title: Competitive Prices
pricing.description: Thanks to our direct partnerships with manufacturers and our logistics optimization, we offer you the best market prices without compromising on quality.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Our optimized logistics network allows us to deliver quickly throughout C么te d'Ivoire. Permanent stock available for delivery within 48h in the Abidjan region.

advice.title: Personalized Advice
advice.description: Our experts guide you in choosing your motorcycle according to your needs, budget and usage. We take the time to understand your expectations to guide you perfectly.

payment.title: Payment Facilities
payment.description: Payment solutions adapted to all profiles. Installment payment facilities, personalized arrangements - we study together the formula that suits you best.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear prices, transparent conditions, no surprises. We believe in a relationship of trust based on honesty and clarity in all our exchanges.

reactivity.title: Reactivity
reactivity.description: Quick response to your requests, express deliveries, available customer service. Your time is precious, we respect that by always being responsive.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Always on the lookout for the latest technologies and models. We continuously invest to offer you the most modern motorcycles on the market.

localEngagement.title: Local Commitment
localEngagement.description: As an Ivorian company, we contribute to local economic development by creating jobs and supporting our country's economy.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Interested in our motorcycles? Contact us for more information or a personalized quote

form.title: Contact Form
form.name: Full Name
form.nameRequired: Name must contain at least 2 characters
form.messageRequired: Message must contain at least 10 characters
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We will contact you soon.

whatsapp.title: Quick Contact
whatsapp.description: Need an immediate response? Contact us directly on WhatsApp
whatsapp.messageDefault: Hello KARTA COMMERCE GENERAL! I'm interested in your QASKI motorcycles. Could you provide me with more information?
whatsapp.messageWithProduct: Hello KARTA COMMERCE GENERAL! I'm interested in the {productName} model from your QASKI range. Could you provide me with more information and a quote? Thank you.

Footer.description: Your trusted partner for purchasing premium motorcycles. Quality, performance and exceptional customer service.

Metadata.title: KARTA COMMERCE GENERAL - Quality at the best prices | QASKI Motorcycles
Metadata.description: KARTA COMMERCE GENERAL offers its QASKI range of premium motorcycles in C么te d'Ivoire. QS125, QS150, utility tricycles. Quality at the best prices with after-sales service, financing and fast delivery.
Metadata.keywords: motorcycle, C么te d'Ivoire, Abidjan, QS125, tricycle, dealer, motorcycle sales, motorcycle financing
